casebody.data:
No. COA15-927. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. May 17, 2016.

In the Matter of the Foreclosure by ROGERS TOWNSEND & THOMAS, PC, Substitute Trustee, of a Deed of Trust Executed by Helen J. Reeb, dated June 18, 2008 and recorded on June 24, 2008 in Book No. 04922 at Page 0108 of the Union County Public Registry.

CASE REPORTED WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Dismissed.
